first-update.title: Started Learning Guitar
first-update.content:
Finally picked up the guitar I bought last year!

I'm starting with some basic chords and it's harder than I thought but really fun.

second-update.title: Trip to the Mountains
second-update.content:
Went hiking this weekend and the views were incredible.

The fresh air and exercise were exactly what I needed.

third-update.title: New Job!
third-update.content:
Excited to announce I'm starting a new position next month.

Looking forward to new challenges and opportunities to grow.
